snippet.title: Official MPR Phaze 1 Preview Trailer.
snippet.description:
Take the first official look at MPR, in 4K! 
More Information: http://aetherlabs.info
Discord: https://discord.com/invite/qG6pgza
Website: http://aetherlabs.info

- Jaw-dropping new visual pass, including all-new textures/lighting/particles and more!
- Restored features from the GameCube release, previously disabled on Wii
- PrimeHack integration for native keyboard/mouse controls & dual-stick gamepad controls
- Adjustable Field of View slider (included in PrimeHack)
- UI customization, including coloring and adding/removing HUD elements
- New features in development!

Trailer edited by: ChozoLabs

Original Trailer Music created by: Wolakking [https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCOKzEPt1OAIUkrMG34OtuAg]

IMPORTANT:
This project is entirely a Mod for a game NOT the game. It does not contain any original assets that could be deemed as copyrighted material. Everything is based around Dolphin with a clean room approach and all artwork is hand crafted from scratch. Moreover, the Mod requires the user to have THEIR OWN ORIGINAL COPY of the game. Without it, the mod is nothing more than a paperweight or a random piece of slightly sophisticated fan-art you'd find all over the internet.
